metadata.title: CVE-2020-18897 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An use-after-free vulnerability in the libpff_item_tree_create_nodefunction of libyal Libpff before 20180623 allows attackers to cause adenial of service (DOS) or execute arbitrary code via a crafted pff file.

criterions.comment: libpff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
